title: Pharmacy Practice Education: Intensive Short-Term Course Using Computer-Based Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmaceutical theory knowledge and foundational patient counseling skills
context.additional_context: Flexible scheduling for working professionals and mobile-environment optimization

learning_goals: Learners will enhance their ability to evaluate drug interactions and side effects through simulation-based patient counseling.
Learners will execute prescription review and dispensing processes with 80% accuracy in a virtual pharmacy environment.
Learners will create patient education materials using digital platforms and apply them to role-playing scenarios at least three times.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
